Text: Why is it you are the only lazy fucker that does not provide screens.  Would be better if you did not upload at all.

I Agree,  Tvteam is so eager to get torrents out to dominate the download scene that i actively seek other versions of the torrent they upload so i can actually see scenes before i download.

take a little extra time for more hits monkeys.

go find a job.
